methods.description: Information about your account calls quota

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the target page

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: HTTP headers to pass to the target page. Can be specified either via a nested query parameter (...&headers[One]=value1&headers=[Another]=value2) or as a JSON encoded object (...&headers={"One": "value1", "Another": "value2"})

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Maximum processing time in ms. Increase it in case of timeout errors (10000 by default, maximum is 30000)

parameters.name: js
parameters.description: Execute on-page JavaScript using a headless browser (true by default)

parameters.name: jsTimeout
parameters.description: Maximum JavaScript rendering time in ms. Increase it in case if you see a loading indicator instead of data on the target page.

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Type of proxy, use residential proxies if your site restricts traffic from datacenters (datacenter by default). Note that residential proxy requests are more expensive than datacenter, see the pricing page for details.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country of the proxy to use (US by default). Only available on Startup and Custom plans.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Type of device emulation.

parameters.name: errorOn404
parameters.description: Return error on 404 HTTP status on the target page (false by default).

parameters.name: errorOnRedirect
parameters.description: Return error on redirect on the target page (false by default).

methods.description: HTML of a selected page area by URL and CSS selector

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: CSS selector (null by default, returns whole page HTML)

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the target page

parameters.name: errorOnRedirect
parameters.description: Return error on redirect on the target page (false by default).

parameters.name: selectors

apiDescription: A client for https://webscraping.ai API. It provides a web scraping automation API with Chrome JavaScript rendering, rotating proxies, and built-in HTML parsing.
